articles.content: As a researcher at the Allen Institute for Brain Science in Seattle, Alice Mukora says she understands the need to enroll diverse populations in Alzheimer's research. But that would be more likely to… [+4854 chars]

articles.author: Emily DeCiccio
articles.title: Surgeon opposes relaxing of Covid restrictions: 'We haven't even come down below the surge last summer' - CNBC
articles.description: Surgeon Dr. Atul Gawande explains why it’s “too soon” to roll back Covid restrictions, as many states ease social distancing rules.
articles.content:
States are easing social distancing rules but it's "too soon" to roll back Covid restrictions, Dr. Atul Gawande warned on CNBC's "The News with Shepard Smith."
